Description:
- Shuffle the left Dead End deck and draw 2 cards. Remove the other card from the game.

- Then, in the right Passageway deck, locate the card that does not match (by title) one of the 2 drawn cards from the Dead End deck. Remove the other 2 cards from the game.

- Shuffle the 3 remaining cards and set them aside, out of play.
Name: Notecard
